oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Lonzo and Oscar Job No. 37172
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Lonzo and Oscar;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 1721) for an order placed by Lonzo and Oscar for 100 two color jumbos (half sheets) for a performance by Lonzo and Oscar, The Harry Weger Show, and The Creepers at the Danville Civic Center on September 18. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
